original_title: เพื่อนตายตลอดไป
overview: Pla Thong's friend, Tod dies but his unfinished business means he can't move on. Pla Thong helps Tod figure out what that unfinished business is, and they realise how each other feels in the process.
tagline: The short movie created for Thailand cosmetics company, Baby Bright.
title: My Baby Bright
